short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GlobalLink Strings plugin, for live previewing webpage translations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The GlobalLink Strings Chrome extension enables live preview translations for your webpage stored in Applanga.

To utilize this extension, you also have to set up the Applanga Command Line Tool (CLI) to download your translation files and modify them with the includeInvisibleId option.

Once integrated with your project, you are able to use the extension to preview your website in all available languages. Edits made on the GlobalLink Strings dashboard will be visible instantly.
